name: Text + Img (Image-focused)
description: Specialized for displaying a single, user-requested image along with its associated details. This is used when retrieving a specific photo from a user's collection based on context like location, time, or content.
examples: Show me my photos from Barcelona.
Find the picture from my walk with the dog.
Show me the photos I took today.

title.description: The primary title for the card, often the location where the photo was taken (e.g., 'Barcelona').

activity_title.description: A short, descriptive heading for the image (e.g., 'Family Trip', 'Running').

info_title.description: Supplementary information or a sub-heading for the image.

info_date.description: The date the photo was taken or is associated with (e.g., '2023-10-26').

background_img.description: The path to the primary image that corresponds to the user's request.

html:
{{ data.title}}

{{ data.activity_title}}

{{ data.info_title }}

{{ data.info_date }}
